title: LFW: Best street style looks at London Fashion Week
text:
Fashion aficionados, journalists, models and designers have descended upon the capital for one of the most highly anticipated fixtures in the sartorial calendar: London Fashion Week.

While for many, the highlight of London Fashion Week is seeing what exuberant creations designers have created for the catwalk, often you only need to look to the streets of the capital for exemplary fashion inspiration.

Those who attend the Fashion Week tend to be acutely aware they could be photographed at any moment, and dress accordingly.

We’ll tell you what’s true. You can form your own view. From 15p €0.18 $0.18 USD 0.27 a day, more exclusives, analysis and extras.

Click through the gallery above to see all the best street-style looks at this September's London Fashion Week.

In the lead-up to London Fashion Week, The Independent spoke to Shutterstock photographer James Veysey to discover exactly what being a Fashion Week photographer entails.

Veysey said there was a sense of "managed chaos" during the seven-day event, saying photographers needed to be "ready and alert at all times" to capture the best shots.

Day one of London Fashion Week was a busy affair, consisting of shows which highlighted environmentalism, women's rights and the detrimental impact of fast fashion.
